title.rendered: Zoll AED Plus AED Fully Automatic Defibrillator

content.rendered:
Zolls AED Plus defibrillator has been uniquely developed to assist the minimally trained user in providing CPR during the defibrillation process with the combination of Zolls Real CPR Help technology and the industry leading, compression depth measuring CPR-D-padz.

Features:

  • Includes the single piece CPR-D-padz with built in depth measurement sensors
  • Illustrated CPR-D-padz aid in the correct placement of defibrillation electrodes
  • Easy intuitive operation
  • Pre-attached defibrillator electrodes to speed up the initial process
  • Back lit screen displays visual prompts and real time feedback on compression depth
  • Display screen shows the amount of shocks applied
  • Audio prompts during CPR with variable pace setting metronome tone
  • Weekly self checks with monthly full energy check
  • Powered by user replaceable Type 123 batteries (x10)
  • Shocks delivered only when shockable rhythm has been detected
  • 3 second countdown before shock is delivered
  • 7 year warranty

Supplied With:

  • 1 pair of electrodes

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 13.3 cm * 24.1cm * 29.2cm
  • Weight: 3.1kg
  • Waveform Analysis: Rectilinear Biphasic
  • Energy Output Range: Automatic Preprogrammed Steps (120J, 150J, 200J)
  • Environmental Resistance: IP55 Rating
  • Maximum Defib Discharges: 225 shocks with new batteries
  • Electrode Lead Wire Length: 1.2m
  • CPR Rate: Variable metronome between 60 to 100 cpm (compressions per minute)
  • Internal Memory Capacity: 50min of ECG and CPR recording
  • Power Source: 10 x Type 123 batteries

PDF FILE: AED_Zoll_AED_Plus_Defibrillator_Brochure
